entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is a magical object that contains a piece of Voldemort's soul. It is described as being cold against Harry's skin, and has a tiny heartbeat ticking irregularly alongside his own.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is trying to destroy the Horcrux that lies against his chest, but is struggling with fear and exhaustion.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is talking softly behind him in the tent. He has the option to walk away from the situation, but Harry does not.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is talking softly behind him in the tent. She has the option to walk away from the situation, but Harry does not.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is mentioned as being connected to the Horcrux through his soul.

relationships.description: Harry has a Horcrux against his chest, which is ticking away the time he has left.
Ron can walk away from Harry and the situation, but chooses not to.
Hermione can walk away from Harry and the situation, but chooses not to.
